assets.description: Tech/AI-inspired logo with three-node spark network symbolizing automation and capital flow.
Flowing AI-inspired energy wave background with magenta-orange-violet gradient, symbolizing data and momentum.
Fluid, AI-inspired grid overlay with luminous lines and subtle magenta-orange glow on a darker gradient base. Designed for layered UI backgrounds and motion visuals.
Dynamic AI-motion inspired post background featuring magenta-orange-violet flow streaks and a semi-transparent Full Send logo watermark. Serves as a fallback visual for post or card generation.
Label-free primary button asset with dark base and magenta-orange-violet gradient. Features soft violet glow and glossy highlight for dynamic UI or automation triggers.
